name: Deadline Reminder
description: Proactive alerts for approaching deadlines at 3 days, 1 day, and day-of

schedule.rationale: Every 6 hours ensures timely deadline detection

payload.message:
Check for upcoming deadlines.

Sources to check:
1. Project README files (look for "deadline:", "due:", "launch:")
2. GitHub issues with due dates
3. PRs with requested review deadlines
4. Memory files with deadline mentions
5. Cron jobs scheduled to run soon

For each deadline:

Only send if deadlines found. Group by urgency.

Keep under 800 chars total.

configuration.schedule: Every 6 hours. Adjust for more/less frequent checks.
configuration.sources: Customize sources in prompt based on where you track deadlines
configuration.thresholds: Default: 3 days, 1 day, same day. Adjust to preference.
configuration.delivery: Telegram by default. Only sends when deadlines detected.
configuration.quiet_hours: Consider adding time-based filtering to avoid late-night alerts

tips: Standardize deadline format in your projects for easier detection
Pair with daily-agenda for comprehensive calendar awareness
Consider separate job for different deadline types (releases vs tasks)
Use memory files to track informal deadlines
